title: Dragonblade Riven skin gone
body: A friend of mine gifted me dragon blade riven and when I went to use the skin it wasn't in my skin option list

replies.body:
relog

had the same problem when I bought yasuo the 1st time
Did they actually gift you? Did you get the Chest on the floating isle?
yeah it's in my gifting history and everything
The only solution is to delete riven from the game.
but but if they remove riven will dig come back?

> [{quoted}](name=DuckyNhoc,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=VKv7lJ5A,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-05-06T09:57:49.070+0000)
>
> but but if they remove riven will dig come back?

dignitas? I don't see why riven getting deleted would bring them back.
